sentence.Network_en: Her tendency to discover a touch of sadness had for the nonce disappeared.
sentence.Network_cn: 她往日那种淡淡的忧伤现在一扫而空了.

sentence.Network_en: This would dissolve a vocabulary into an infinite number of nonce words.
sentence.Network_cn: 这将使一张词汇表分解成无数临时的词.

sentence.Network_en: Bob is a fool, to be dozing at the very nonce.
sentence.Network_cn: 鲍勃真是个笨蛋, 在这个节骨眼上还打瞌睡.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from then anes 'the one (purpose') (from then, obsolete oblique form of the + ane 'one' + -s), altered by misdivision; compare with newt and nickname
